name: Syrian Warfare
description: Real Time Strategy with a high degree of realism. The game is based on a true story.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bit) Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 (3.1 GHz) / AMD A10 5800K (3.8 GHz) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 440 (1024 MB) / Radeon HD 4890 (1024 MB) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bit) Processor: Intel Core i5-4400 (3.1 GHz) /  AMD A10 6800K  (4.1 GHz) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 (2048 MB) / Radeon R9 280 (2048 MB) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 10 GB available space
